Christmas is upon us – and with that comes Christmas albums. Michael W. Smith brings us his latest holiday album – “Michael W. Smith and Friends: The Spirit of Christmas,” the new album from the multi-talented Smith. It includes a star studded list of guests who sing on the album – including: Vince Gill, Lady Antebellum, Little Big Town, Martina McBride, Amy Grant, Carrie Underwood, Jennifer Nettles, Bono and Michael McDonald.
